text: This is a list of Bulgarian football transfers for the 2017 summer transfer window. Only transfers involving a team from the two professional leagues, First League and Second League are listed. ==First League== ===Beroe=== In: Out: ===Botev Plovdiv=== In: Out: ===Cherno More=== In: Out: ===CSKA Sofia=== In: Out: ===Dunav=== In: Out: ===Etar=== In: Out: ===Levski Sofia=== In: Out: ===Lokomotiv Plovdiv=== In: Out: ===Ludogorets=== In: Out: Трети футболист аут от Лудогорец! ===Pirin Blagoevgrad=== In: Out: ===Septemvri Sofia=== In: Септември привлече Елтон Дос Рейс Септември се подсили с нападател Out: Борис Галчев: Монтана с тези 15 точки за никаква лига не е! ===Slavia Sofia=== In: Out: ===Vereya=== In: Out: ===Vitosha Bistritsa=== In: Out: ==Second League== ===Botev Galabovo=== In: Out: ===Botev Vratsa=== In: Out: ===Chernomorets Balchik=== In: Out: ===Litex=== In: Out: ===Lokomotiv GO=== In: Out: ===Lokomotiv Sofia=== In: Out: Владислав Мисяк напусна Локомотив (София) ===Ludogorets Razgrad II=== In: Out: ===Maritsa Plovdiv=== In: Out: ===Montana=== In: Out: ===Neftochimic Burgas=== In: Out: ===Nesebar=== In: Out: ===Oborishte=== In: Out: ===Pomorie=== In: Out: ===Sozopol=== In: Созопол връща Коста Стоянов във футбола Out: ===Strumska Slava=== In: Out: ===Tsarsko Selo=== In: Out: ==References== Bulgaria Summer 2017
title: List of Bulgarian football transfers summer 2017
